title: client issue
body:
Hi

So recently I have had this issue with Arams games randomly for no apparent reason sometimes the other  players connection will reach a certain point then stop, or everyone will connect accept 1 person and it'll just freeze from there. In 1 game I sat and waited for 8 minutes and nothing happened. All I can do is close the client, reload it and log back in sometimes 5-10 minutes after the game has started because its hard to tell if it's me or someone else not loading.
So is this something to do with my computer, client or is it on Riots end? 

Also I have been recording games so I can re-watch them and improve my game but in doing so I've found a number of bugs and things that totally contradict what champions abilities are supposed to do. I'm not sure though if there is a forum discussion area for that or someone I ask about it? 
Thank you for your time.

replies.body:
Hey there,

That definitely sounds odd, have you tried [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)?

Also you said you've been recording your games, have you been using lolreplay/any other replay tool for this? I would recommend disabling/uninstalling those as they have been known to conflict with the game. A better replay system can be found at http://www.replay.gg/
